articles.description: Jack Black is returning to one of his most iconic characters and one of his best franchises, as a sequel movie was announced.
articles.content:
By James Brizuela
| Published 13 hours ago
Jack Black has been in some fantastic films and shows, but it has been announced that he is finally returning to his best franchise. That franchise is Kun… [+2756 chars]
